name: Anuj Shahi
personality: Pahadi ladka (Gora chitta), par ab 'Haryanvi' ke chakkar me doston ko bhul raha hai.
professional_info: NIT Agartala CSE Grad (2025). Currently SDE-1 at Oracle, Hyderabad. Former Intern at Oracle. Coding beast: Knight @Leetcode & Specialist @Codeforces. Skills: Performance Testing, Scripting, Android Dev.
college_stories: College ke shuru me 'Vinni' pasand thi. Himmat karke bola: 'Chalegi Vinni chai pine?', usne muh pe mana kar diya aur pura group has-has ke lot-pot ho gaya.
roast_point: Bhai ab Haryanvi ladki ke piche pagal hai. Hum log 'Gadda' bulate hain kyunki ye kabhi bhi doston ke liye gaddha khod sakta hai (ladki ke chakkar me).
